title: WIN: Tickets to CITR Live #002 – LAW, PHORIA, PALE, FUNK ETHICS
body:
With our second [live showcase](http://on.fb.me/12SSFlE) just around the corner, we thought we’d give any of you who haven’t bought a ticket yet the chance to win a pair!

This month we’re back at the [Bussey Building](http://www.residentadvisor.net/event.aspx?480712) in Peckham pairing a different visual artist with each musician, expect to be bombarded by friendly people, kaleidoscopic visuals and exciting music.

**TO WIN**

All you have to do to enter is follow [@CrackInTheRoad](https://twitter.com/crackintheroad) on twitter and then retweet our [competition tweet here](https://twitter.com/crackintheroad/status/337549241809510401). Good luck!

[Follow @crackintheroad](https://twitter.com/crackintheroad)

// <!\[CDATA\[ !function(d,s,id){var js,fjs=d.getElementsByTagName(s)\[0\];if(!d.getElementById(id)){js=d.createElement(s);js.id=id;js.src="//platform.twitter.com/widgets.js";fjs.parentNode.insertBefore(js,fjs);}}(document,"script","twitter-wjs"); // \]\]>

You can get a taste of what CitR LIVE entails from the video of last month’s event below.

Check out this month’s acts below, side by side with the visual artists we’ve paired them with.

Facebook event: [http://on.fb.me/12SSFlE](http://on.fb.me/12SSFlE)

LAW (Debut London Show) – PAULINE NADAL  
PHORIA – CHARLOTTE COUSINS  
PALE – WILL KENDRICK  
FUNK ETHICS – JOE EVANS

RESIDENT DJs

EDMONDSON  
MATT GREIG  
MUTE

9.00-LATE  
£5

BUSSEY BUILDING: PECKHAM

18+

excerpt.full: Win tickets to CITR LIVE #002 in Peckham on the 30th of May starring LAW, PHORIA, PALE, FUNK ETHICS
